| ------------------ | -------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |

| `icon`             | `icon`               | The toolbar-item icon                                        | `"error" \| "success" \| "warning" \| "none" \| "add" \| "add-circle" \| "arrow-down" \| "arrow-left" \| "arrow-right" \| "arrow-up" \| "chevron-down" \| "chevron-left" \| "chevron-right" \| "chevron-up" \| "circle" \| "close" \| "color-picker" \| "deleted" \| "drag" \| "duplicate" \| "edit" \| "edit-wand" \| "empty" \| "file" \| "folder" \| "level-down" \| "level-up" \| "minus" \| "minus-circle" \| "more-info" \| "pill-filled" \| "pill-outlined" \| "reset" \| "search" \| "settings" \| "show-more-horizontal" \| "show-more-vertical"` | `null`      |
| `subtitle`         | `subtitle`           | The toolbar-item subtitle                                    | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | `undefined` |
